text: Rien R. Morris (died 2015 or 2016) was a Marshallese politician and government minister. As of 2015 he was Minister of Justice and represented Jaluit Atoll in the Nitijela. In 2013 he was Minister of Transport and Communications. ==References== Category:Government ministers of the Marshall Islands Category:Marshallese politicians Category:2010s deaths Category:Year of birth missing
title: Rien Morris
